required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: First Line Osimertinib in the Real World: an Inter-regional Prospective Study
clinical_study.official_title: First Line Osimertinib in the Real World: an Inter-regional Prospective Study: FLOWER

brief_summary.textblock: This study (FLOWER) will investigate effectiveness, safety, progression patterns and clinical management of untreated advanced NSCLC patients receiving fist-line osimertinib in the real-world.

detailed_description.textblock:
FLOWER is a real-world, prospective, observational study enrolling patients with histological and/or cytological diagnosis of EGFR-mutant aNSCLC, receiving first-line treatment with the third-generation EGFR-TKI, osimertinib. All the patients received osimertinib at the recommended dose of 80 mg, orally, once a day. Dosing interruptions or reductions required, based on individual tolerability, were managed according to clinical practice in compliance with label indications.
The FLOWER study aims at evaluating effectiveness, safety, progression pattern and clinical management of untreated EGFR-mutant aNSCLC patients in the real-world.

primary_outcome.time_frame: The primary analysis of mTTD will occur when all patients have had the opportunity to be treated for 6 months
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the effectiveness of osimertinib in the real-world

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of treatment related adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: The primary analysis of safety will occur when all patients have had the opportunity to be treated for 6 months
primary_outcome.description: to evaluate safety of patients treated with osimertinib in the real-world

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of dose reduction and temporary or definitive treatment interruption due to AE
primary_outcome.time_frame: The primary analysis of safety will occur when all patients have had the opportunity to be treated for 6 months
primary_outcome.description: to evaluate safety of patients treated with osimertinib in the real-world

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The primary analysis of mOS will occur when all patients have had the opportunity to be treated for 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the effectiveness of osimertinib in the real-world

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The primary analysis of mPFS will occur when all patients have had the opportunity to be treated for 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the effectiveness of osimertinib in the real-world

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The primary analysis of ORR will occur when all patients have had the opportunity to be treated for 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the effectiveness of osimertinib in the real-world

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The primary analysis of progression patterns will occur when all patients have had the opportunity to be treated for 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the pattern of progression to first-line osimertinib in the real-world

other_outcome.measure: Diagnostic-therapeutic pathway of patients included in the study
other_outcome.time_frame: The primary analysis of diagnostic-therapeutic pathways will occur when all patients have had the opportunity to be treated for 6 months
other_outcome.description: To describe the diagnostic-therapeutic pathway of patients included in the study

clinical_study.condition: EGF-R Positive Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer

arm_group.arm_group_label: Untreated EGFR-mutant advanced non-small-cell lung cancer patients

intervention.description: Osimertinib is administered according to clinical practice at the recommended dose of 80 mg, orally, once a day.
intervention.arm_group_label: Untreated EGFR-mutant advanced non-small-cell lung cancer patients

study_pop.textblock: The study will include histologically confirmed advanced/metastatic NSCLC patients with sensitizing alteration of EGFR receiving osimertinib treatment in first-line setting.
